code: import React from'react';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const{user,role,signOut}=useAuth();const handleLogout=async()=>{await signOut();};const getRoleDisplayName=role=>{switch(role){case'INWARD_CLERK':return'Inward Clerk';case'QUALITY_CHECKER':return'Quality Checker';case'APPROVER':return'Approver';case'SUPERADMIN':return'Super Admin';default:return'User';}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"bg-white shadow-sm border-b border-gray-200",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center h-16",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900",children:"Fabric Ledger Management"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-700",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-medium",children:getRoleDisplayName(role)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-gray-500 ml-2",children:["(",user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.email,")"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"bg-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors",children:"Logout"})]})]})})});};export default Header;
